檳.definition: betel palm (Areca catechu); betel nut; Taiwan pr. [bin1]

檳子.definition: binzi; a species of apple which is slightly sour and astringent

檳椥.definition: Ben Tre, province and city in Vietnam

檳榔西施.definition: (Tw) betel nut beauty: a skimpily-dressed, attractive girl who sells betel nut from a glass-walled roadside booth

檳知.definition: Ben Tre, province and city in Vietnam
